distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for apport fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:
- CVE-2015-1338: Insecurely created crash dumps could lead to a DoS or privilege escalation through
  malicious symlinks. (bsc#947731)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: kernel_crashdump in Apport before 2.19 allows local users to cause a denial of service (disk consumption) or possibly gain privileges via a (1) symlink or (2) hard link attack on /var/crash/vmcore.log.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
